summary: Defines FastAPI routes and helper functions for managing Prefect Deployment objects, covering creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, schedule manipulation, flow‑run triggering, and related validation and database interactions.
business_intent: Expose a RESTful interface that allows users and services to programmatically control Prefect deployments—creating and configuring deployments, adjusting schedules, launching flow runs, and linking deployments to work queues—so that workflow orchestration can be managed via HTTP requests.
